tidbits.title: Australian External Territory
tidbits.description: Norfolk Island is an external territory of Australia, known for its natural beauty, historic sites, and tranquil lifestyle.

tidbits.title: Colonial History
tidbits.description: The island has a colonial history, visible in its heritage architecture, including Kingston, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

tidbits.title: Unique Flora and Fauna
tidbits.description: Norfolk Island boasts unique flora and fauna, with species found nowhere else, making it a haven for nature enthusiasts.
